meanings.definition: A person who is seconded to another position or organization.
meanings.sent1: The secondee quickly adapted to their new role.
meanings.sent2: The company sent a secondee to assist with the project.
meanings.sent3: The secondee accidentally took the wrong bus to work, ending up in a different city!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a secondee, injecting new ideas into the team.
meanings.sent5: The secondee's enthusiasm was contagious, lifting the spirits of the entire office.

meanings.definition: The act of seconding someone to a different position or organization.
meanings.sent1: The secondee process required careful planning.
meanings.sent2: The secondee was a common practice in the company.
meanings.sent3: The secondee of the day involved sending the IT specialist to the marketing department.
meanings.sent4: The secondee of resources from one department to another helped streamline operations.
meanings.sent5: The secondee was like a bridge connecting different parts of the organization.
